Author: Andy#1801
Content: @Deleted User We found a bug in the native implementation of the `ionic-webview` plugin. To serve the content, they started an internal server. But this server is accessible to the whole operating system, so if you manage to start your own server before it, then someone could inject any code into your app. Granted, it's not that easy to exploit. But not only crypto-currency related apps were affected, we even found a microsoft app that was affected. Here's a small proof of concept video we made: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RR1r323otOQ
